GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v5.15.34
GSD.description:
rxrpc: fix a race in rxrpc_exit_net()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit 571d8e1d154ca18f08dcb72b69318d36e10010a0, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit ace45bec6d77bc061c3c3d8ad99e298ea9800c2b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: rxrpc: fix a race in rxrpc_exit_net()
